summary: The Coast Guard has more than 20,000 shore facilities such as boat and air stations, and piers at over 2,700 locations. We testified about the deteriorating condition of these facilities and the Coast Guard’s management of them, including its approach to better preparing them to withstand extreme weather. The Coast Guard has a backlog of at least $2.6 billion in maintenance as of 2018. It...
title: Coast Guard Shore Infrastructure: Actions Needed to Better Manage Assets and Reduce Risks and Costs
